title: The Greedy Monkey
story: Once upon a time in a forest, a monkey saw a farmer hiding bananas in two different trees. Instead of choosing one, the greedy monkey jumped from one tree to another, losing both chances. He went hungry. The moral: Greed can make you lose everything.

title: The Wise Tortoise
story: All animals once gathered to build a bridge across the river. The tortoise, being slow, was mocked. But in the end, it was the tortoise's patience that brought the animals together and finished the bridge. The moral: Patience and wisdom matter more than speed.
